substitution.copyText: to call it; | Sith not th'exterior, nor the inward man | Resembles that it was:
that thus hath put him | so much from the understanding of himself
That being of so young days brought up with him, | '' And sith so neighboured to his youth and behaviour,
substitution.amendedText: Mar. Pray tell me he that knows,

substitution.copyText: That you vouchsafe your rest here in our Court Some little time,
substitution.amendedText: That you vouchsafe your pray here in our Court Some little time,

substitution.copyText: To draw him on to pleasures, and to gather | So much as from occasion you may glean,
substitution.amendedText: To draw him on to pleasures, and to learn
